Interface IAI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EasyAI, HardAI, MediumAI

    public interface IAI
    This is the interface, shared by all IA, which has only one method to be called to get a decision

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getNewDir(char dir, int x, int y, int[][] grid, int[][] timer)
      Method to be implemented

    • Method Detail

      • getNewDir

        char getNewDir(char dir,
               int x,
               int y,
               int[][] grid,
               int[][] timer)
        Method to be implemented
        Parameters:
        dir - the current direction of the player (0=Up, 1=Right, 2=Down, 3=Left)
        x - the x position of the player on the grid (column; 0 = left)
        y - the y position of the player on the grid (line; 0 = top)
        grid - a copy of the current grid representation
        timer - a copy of the current freshness information
        Returns:
        a character as a movement decision ('U', 'R', 'L', 'D').
